alert.note: Alert for George; Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 10:50AM CST until December 30 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CST FOR MOBILE...EASTERN GEORGE AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 1050 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Leakesville to 7 miles north of Hurley to Escatawpa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Citronelle, Lucedale, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Axis, Mount Vernon, Tanner Williams, Semmes and Wilmer. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
